name: Travis-CI
body:
Travis-CI
=========

An Android app (done in HTML5 using PhoneGap/Cordova) for [Travis-CI](https://travis-ci.org/)

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/floydpink/Travis-CI.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/floydpink/Travis-CI)

Scan QR code to install this app on your Android device:

![Scan QR Code to Install](https://raw.github.com/floydpink/Travis-CI/master/installer-qr-code.png)
 
Or, click [here](http://floydpink.github.com/Travis-CI-www/) to check out this ember.js app on the web

#### Some mockups we're shooting for!
 
![Landing](https://raw.github.com/floydpink/Travis-CI/master/mockups/landing.png) ![Builds History](https://raw.github.com/floydpink/Travis-CI/master/mockups/all-builds.png) ![Single Build](https://raw.github.com/floydpink/Travis-CI/master/mockups/single-build.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
